excerpt: "ISLAMABAD: The Ministry of Information Technology and Telecommunication has drafted the “National Artificial Intelligence (AI) Policy,” aimed at embracing AI by appreciating human intelligence and stimulating a hybrid intelligence ecosystem for equitable, responsible, and transparent use of AI."
